  • Element
griffon.plugins.quartz

Annotation Type Scheduled


  • @Inherited
@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Scheduled
    Job classes annotated with Scheduled will be automatically scheduled.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      String cronExpression
      The cron expression to base the schedule on.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String jobGroup
      The Job group.
      String jobName
      The Job name, must be unique within the group.
      int priority
      The Trigger's priority.
      boolean requestRecovery
      Instructs the Scheduler whether or not the Job should be re-executed if a recovery or fail-over situation is encountered.
      boolean storeDurably
      Whether or not the Job should remain stored after it is orphaned (no Triggers point to it).
      String timeZoneId
      The time zone for which the cronExpression of this CronTrigger will be resolved.
      String triggerGroup
      The Trigger group.
      String triggerName
      The Trigger name, must be unique within the group.

    • Element Detail

      • cronExpression

        public abstract String cronExpression
        The cron expression to base the schedule on.

      • jobName

        public abstract String jobName
        The Job name, must be unique within the group.
        Default:
        "##default"

      • jobGroup

        public abstract String jobGroup
        The Job group.
        Default:
        "DEFAULT"

      • requestRecovery

        public abstract boolean requestRecovery
        Instructs the Scheduler whether or not the Job should be re-executed if a recovery or fail-over situation is encountered.
        Default:
        false

      • storeDurably

        public abstract boolean storeDurably
        Whether or not the Job should remain stored after it is orphaned (no Triggers point to it).
        Default:
        false

      • triggerName

        public abstract String triggerName
        The Trigger name, must be unique within the group.
        Default:
        "##default"

      • triggerGroup

        public abstract String triggerGroup
        The Trigger group.
        Default:
        "DEFAULT"

      • timeZoneId

        public abstract String timeZoneId
        The time zone for which the cronExpression of this CronTrigger will be resolved.
        Default:
        "##default"

      • priority

        public abstract int priority
        The Trigger's priority. When more than one Trigger have the same fire time, the scheduler will fire the one with the highest priority first.
        Default:
        0
